title: Voodoo Public House
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A gastropub with clearly labeled vegan items such as the V burger and the black bean & lentil burger with vegan mayo. Daily soup is usually vegan. Offers occasional specials, such as pulled jack fruit sandwiches (vegan).  Other items could possibly be made vegan; please inquire. Deli case will typically stock grab and go items such as vegan potato salad, hummus and veggies, vegan cookies, and other baked goods. Also has a food truck.
